column4: hi running Hardy - where are the ~/.xinitrc  and/or .Xsession files ?
if they exist, they're in your home dir, where they belong
are you making sure hidden files are shown?
i dont have those files either
never did get that thing to work...
but yes, i know of it
if you need them for something, go ahead and make them, but overall those files aren't a necessity
i think it's the scrollwheel up
1 is left, 2 is right, 3 is middle click, 4 & 5 are scroll wheel
